餟是一个汉语词语，拼音是chuò。古同“啜”。
餟 is a Chinese word, pinyin is chuò. Gu Tong "slurped".

餟字的基本解释

餟
chuò
古同“啜”。

餟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuì］
［《廣韻》陟衛切，去祭，知。］
［《廣韻》陟劣切，入薛，知。］
亦作“腏1”。
(1)同“醊”。祭奠时以酒浇在地上。参见“餟食”、“餟酹”。
(2)饮、喝。

餟字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　餟； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1421第25
【唐韻】陟衞切【集韻】【韻會】株衞切，?音綴。【玉篇】祭酹也，餽也。【史記·武帝紀】其下四方地爲餟食。【註】索隱曰：餟謂聮續而祭之。【正義曰】謂繞壇設諸神祭座，相連綴也。【前漢·郊祀志】作腏。【循吏傳】作醊。　又【廣韻】陟劣切【集韻】株劣切，?音輟。義同。

餟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
餟字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
chuò
Gu Tong "sip".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuì］
["Guang Yun" Zhi Wei cut, go to sacrifice, know. ]
["Guang Yun" Zhi is inferior, enters Xue, knows. ]
Also known as "Elixir 1".
(1) Same as "醊". Pouring wine on the ground during the memorial ceremony. See "餟食", "餟酹".
(2) Drink and drink.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Food Character Department】　餟; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1421 Page 25
[Tang Yun] Zhi Weiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Zhu Weiqie, with a sound embellishment. [Jade articles] Sacrifice and feed. 【Historical Records·Wu Emperor Ji】The four places under it are for food. [Note] Suo Yin said: It is said that it will continue to be sacrificed. [Justice] It is said that there are sacrificial seats for the gods around the altar, and they are connected with each other. [Previous Han·Jiao Si Zhi] As an elixir. 【Xun Official Biography】For 醊.　[Guang Yun] Zhi Qiao [Ji Yun] is not good, and the sound is broken. The same meaning.
